links.*: The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)

wikitext.*:
'''Martyn Read''' (born [[11 November|November 11]], [[1944]]) is an English actor, who has spent most of his career playing policemen. He voiced [[Halbarad]] and several unspecified bits in the [[The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)|1981 radio series of ''The Lord of the Rings]]''.
